title: 01/07/2021 - HOUR 1 - Lamar Jackson, Rivers-Big Ben, Brady
itunes:title: 01/07/2021 - HOUR 1 - Lamar Jackson, Rivers-Big Ben, Brady
description:
There is a ridiculous Lamar Jackson narrative that needs to end

Philip Rivers had to overcome more than Ben Roethlisberger

The Patriots defense really misses Tom Brady


Guest: Mark Schlereth

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
